translation.en: We should've done this ourselves.
translation.fr: On aurait dû le faire nous-mêmes.

translation.en: We know the king's palace better than your patsy does.
translation.fr: On connaît mieux le palais que la petite.

translation.en: Teela hasn't failed us yet.
translation.fr: Tila ne nous a jamais déçus.

translation.en: She'll find what we seek.
With that sword, the Power of Grayskull
translation.fr: Avec cette épée, le pouvoir de Grayskull sera bientôt à nous.

translation.en: will soon be ours.
translation.fr: le pouvoir de Grayskull sera bientôt à nous.

translation.en: How's the nation of Eternos this evening?
translation.fr: Comment va la nation d'Eternos ce soir ?

translation.en: Quiet as a shadow, King Randor.
Never trust shadows, General.
You catch that game of modulok?
translation.fr: Tu connais le jeu de Modulok ?

translation.en: No, modulok's too complicated.
Running on your hands and passing with your feet?
translation.fr: Courir sur les mains, passer aux pieds ?

translation.en: No, thank you.
I'll take it from here, Soldier.
Of course, General Dolos.
I'll take it from here, Soldier.
Evelyn better pay me this time.
translation.fr: Evelyn a intérêt de me payer.

translation.en: Oh, come on!
'Word witch didn't say there'd be this many to choose from.
translation.fr: Elle n'a pas dit qu'il y en aurait autant.

translation.en: - Okay. -
Which one of you is gonna give me that trademark Teela Grayskull tingle?
translation.fr: Lequel d'entre vous va réveiller l'intuition Grayskull chez Tila ?

translation.en: I've been contracted to go through all this trouble to steal a--
translation.fr: J'ai dû affronter tout ça pour voler une…

translation.en: Sword, Eternia, Grayskull, secrets, Eternia, Power,
Masters of the Universe, Masters of the Universe.
That was way more than a tingle.
Drop the sword!
I'll just put it right... here.
translation.fr: Je vais la mettre juste là.

translation.en: Did she just continue to steal?
Sorry.  I just needed my hands free to do... this.
translation.fr: Désolée, j'avais besoin de mes mains pour faire ça !

translation.en: Oh, no!
How will we ever grab our swords with our other hands?
translation.fr: Comment attraper nos épées avec nos autres mains ?

translation.en: Oh, sorry. My thumb stuck.
Able to do... this!
Oh, yeah, much better.
Somebody stop her!
- You! Halt! - Get her now!
Go! Go! Get her!
Ah- ha- ha, one of my legs fell asleep, sorry.
Must you have brought your apprentice along?
translation.fr: Tu étais obligé d'emmener ton apprenti ?

translation.en: You! Halt!
Duncan didn't bring the Royal Guard to the extraction point.
translation.fr: Duncan n'a pas ramené la garde royale.

translation.en: Just sayin'.
Incoming!
What an unfortunate turn of events...
for them.
No! They're just doing their jobs!
translation.fr: Non ! Ils ne font que leur boulot !

translation.en: Give me the sword, Hand Witch.
That sword does not belong to her.
translation.fr: Cette épée ne lui appartient pas.

translation.en: Start the engine, kid. This is a bust.
We're on our way to you.
The sword is right there.
Our key to universal unstoppable power is right there!
translation.fr: Notre clé pour un pouvoir universel et inarrêtable est juste là !

translation.en: We don't gotta find the sword again, just the girl.
translation.fr: On n'a pas à retrouver l'épée, juste la fille.

translation.en: Let's move.
Bring the sword to the champion.
What champion?
I have the Power!
translation.fr: Je détiens la force toute puissante !

translation.en: ♪ The Power is ours ♪
translation.fr: Le pouvoir jaillit du fond de l'âme

translation.en: ♪ It's in our so- o- o- o- o- o- o- o- o- oul ♪
translation.fr: Le pouvoir jaillit du fond de l'âme Whoa

translation.en: ♪ The Power is ours ♪
translation.fr: Le pouvoir jaillit du fond de l'âme

translation.en: ♪ It's in our so- o- o- o- o- o- o- o- o- oul ♪
translation.fr: Le pouvoir jaillit du fond de l'âme  Whoa

translation.en: ♪ The Power is ours ♪
♪ Hey, we'll find our purpose ♪
translation.fr: Le pouvoir jaillit prêt pour le grand combat !

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause we know we're worth it ♪
♪ And we'll be remembered ♪
♪ We are the defenders, defenders ♪
translation.fr: Les défenseurs sont là Ils sont là…

translation.en: - ♪ Oh ♪ - ♪ We fight for the win ♪
translation.fr: - Ils sont là - Jusqu'à la victoire, oh

translation.en: ♪ We fight till the end ♪
- ♪ We fight for the win ♪ - ♪ The Power is ours ♪
translation.fr: Allons jusqu'au bout, oh - Jusqu'à la victoire, oh - Le pouvoir jaillit du fond de l'âme

translation.en: ♪ It's in our soul ♪
translation.fr: - Jusqu'à la victoire, oh - Le pouvoir jaillit du fond de l'âme

translation.en: Hang in there, Kitty. I've got you.
Just crawl onto my shoulders and we can both go home.
translation.fr: Monte sur mes épaules et on pourra rentrer.

translation.en: No.
What do you mean, no?
I don't want us to fall.
We won't fall.
We won't fall...
...if you get on my shoulders right now.
translation.fr: si tu montes sur mon épaule !

translation.en: Did you, like, eat rocks today?
translation.fr: Tu as mangé des pierres aujourd'hui ?

translation.en: I thought they were potatoes.
Did they taste like potatoes?
translation.fr: Ils avaient le goût de patates ?

translation.en: I've never had a potato before.
- - How am I supposed to know?
You jump the rest of the way. What about you?
I'll be fine.
Dragonfly.
- No. - Dragonfly.
No, don't do it. Focus.
Dragonfly!
Adam, are you two done yet?
Or do you wanna hang out some more?
How long have you been there?
Long enough to work on that joke.
Thought it might defuse the tension.
Way to take my mind off of imminent death, Krass.
translation.fr: Me distraire de la mort, Krass.

translation.en: Thanks.
What are best friends for?
You weren't on tracker duty today.
What are you doing out here? Cringer's missing,
translation.fr: - Tu fais quoi ? - Cringer a disparu.

translation.en: and this part of the woods has the best snacks for grabbing,
translation.fr: Et cette forêt a les meilleurs en-cas.

translation.en: so I figured why not start looking for him here?
translation.fr: Je me suis dit que j'allais commencer par là.

translation.en: Wait, did you just say Cringer was missing?
translation.fr: Attends, tu as dit que Cringer a disparu ?

translation.en: Kitty, did you come out here looking for your uncle?
translation.fr: Petit chat, tu es venu chercher ton oncle ?

translation.en: Maybe.
He said he wanted to go hunting again.
translation.fr: Il a dit qu'il voulait chasser.

translation.en: Puh! He can't hunt without claws.
Try telling him that.
Contain. Shut.
- - Push.
Release me, or incur the wrath of my tribe,
translation.fr: Libérez-moi, ou vous devrez faire face à ma tribu, sales brutes !

translation.en: you Beastopoid brutes.
translation.fr: ou vous devrez faire face à ma tribu, sales brutes !

translation.en: Quarry talks like it is people.
translation.fr: La proie parle comme les gens.

translation.en: Quarry talks like we are people.
translation.fr: Elle nous parle comme aux gens.

translation.en: Don't you poachers want more from life than caging and hurting animals?
translation.fr: Vous ne voulez pas mieux que des animaux en cage ?

translation.en: Why not rise up against your keeper?
Try living for yourselves.
Initiate capture.
An uprising would displease our keeper.
translation.fr: Une rébellion déplairait à notre chef.

translation.en: Query for quarry: what happened to you
translation.fr: Capturer proie. Que t'est-il arrivé quand tu t'es opposé à notre chef ?

translation.en: when last you displeased our keeper?
translation.fr: Que t'est-il arrivé quand tu t'es opposé à notre chef ?

translation.en: Fair point, my subservient captors.
R'qazz will be most pleased to have you back in the fight pit.
translation.fr: R'Qazz sera ravi de te revoir dans la fosse au combat.

translation.en: He may add your skull to his trophy belt after your loss.
translation.fr: Il mettra peut-être ton crâne à sa ceinture de trophées.

translation.en: Oh, what an honor.
Let me at those circuit brains. No time for the bots.
translation.fr: - Je vais m'occuper de ces… - Pas le temps.

translation.en: We gotta spring Cringer.
I knew you'd come for me.
We needed a faster ride home anyway. Stand back.
translation.fr: - On rentre chez nous plus vite. - Recule.

translation.en: Hang on!
Initiate stowaway protocol.
Great plan! Now what?
You up for a game of ram- ball?
I'm wearing my helmet, ain't I?
Adam of the Tiger Tribe risks it all...
translation.fr: Adam de la tribu Tigre risque tout

translation.en: ...to send Krass to the net.
Will she make the...
Have I mentioned how much I hate this game?
translation.fr: J'ai déjà dit combien je déteste ce jeu ?

translation.en: Ow! Whoa!
Ow.
Happy to see you too.
But hug me any tighter, and I'll let them keep you next time.
translation.fr: mais si tu serres plus fort, je te sauve plus.

translation.en: Wait. What happened to Krass?
Tiger Tribe for the win!
Cringer, next time you feel like
translation.fr: Cringer ! Si tu veux te battre avec des robots, appelle-nous.

translation.en: taking on some Beastopoids, let us know, huh?
translation.fr: Si tu veux te battre avec des robots, appelle-nous.

translation.en: Now, where would the fun in that be?
Tiger Tribe forever?
Tiger Tribe forever.
Why would you go hunting alone again?
Everyone in the tribe does their part.
translation.fr: Tout le monde participe à la tribu.

translation.en: Even without my claws, I'd like to still do mine.
translation.fr: Même sans mes griffes, j'aimerais aider.

translation.en: Spoken like a true Stripe.
I don't need a special tattoo to be a part of the tribe.
translation.fr: J'ai pas besoin de rayure pour être de la tribu.

translation.en: You keep saying that, but I never see you leave.
translation.fr: Tu dis toujours ça, mais tu es toujours là.

translation.en: Now, now, Krass'tine.
Every lost soul the tribe adopts gets their stripes when they so choose.
translation.fr: Chaque adopté par la tribu reçoit ses rayures quand il veut.

translation.en: If Adam isn't ready to set aside his cuff and get his stripe,
translation.fr: S'il n'abandonne pas sa menotte pour une rayure,

translation.en: Adam isn't ready.
This is all I have from my life before.
translation.fr: C'est tout ce que j'ai de mon passé.

translation.en: What if whoever lost me doesn't recognize me without this?
translation.fr: On pourrait me reconnaître grâce à ça.

translation.en: It's been ten years.
Ah, they probably stopped looking for you by now.
Whatever, helmet head.
Kitty, what you doing?
There's a lady in the tree.
Um, can we help you, tree lady?
Uh, your village is full of cats.
translation.fr: Votre village est plein de félins.

translation.en: I'm apparently afraid of cats.
Then why did you come out here to where the Tiger Tribe lives?
translation.fr: Alors pourquoi venir ici, où vit la tribu des tigres ?

translation.en: A voice in my head told me to.
translation.fr: Une voix dans ma tête me l'a dit ?

translation.en: Ask it how much it knows about cats being able to climb trees.
translation.fr: Elle t'a dit qu'ils savent grimper aux arbres ?

translation.en: Why?
I got her!
Adam. Teela.
Magic!
- What if she got caught? - We'd know.
I've been listening to the Royal security channels.
translation.fr: Je l'aurais entendu à la radio des gardes.

translation.en: Right, because of all the crime we're doing.
translation.fr: Bien sûr, parce qu'on commet des crimes.

translation.en: This is about revenge on the king,
translation.fr: Il s'agit de se venger du roi.

translation.en: We're not not doing crime, though.
translation.fr: Mais on commet quand même un crime.

translation.en: You find her yet?
We're here. Descend.
Is that an actual poacher ship?
The sword doesn't want her found.
Think I can get these poacher bots up and running to hunt her scent.
translation.fr: Ces robots braconniers la trouveront à l'odeur.

translation.en: Do it. Find the traitorous whelp.
Apprentice, get to work.
Why aren't you afraid of magic like the rest of your people?
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas peur de la magie comme les autres ?

translation.en: To be clear, the cats don't like magic.
translation.fr: En fait, les félins n'aiment pas la magie.

translation.en: Why let yourself get captured?
You wouldn't understand.
Oh, because I'm from the jungle and you're from the city?
translation.fr: Car je viens de la jungle et toi, de la ville ?

translation.en: Believe me, you're from the city.
translation.fr: Crois-moi. Tu viens de la ville.

translation.en: I am?
Yeah, your accent sounds like you were born into an upper family.
translation.fr: Tu parles de manière très soutenue, comme la royauté.

translation.en: Just count your lucky stars you're out here and not back in the house that Randor built.
translation.fr: Tu as de la chance d'être ici et pas chez Randor.

translation.en: You don't like the king?
No one likes the king,
especially at street level...
translation.fr: surtout les gens de la rue.

translation.en: or below street level, which is where I usually am.
translation.fr: Ou en dessous de la rue, où je suis d'habitude.

translation.en: Randor won't do anything about all the poaching out here,
translation.fr: Randor ne fait rien contre le braconnage,

translation.en: so he's no friend of the tribe's either.
And now that we're done bonding,
shouldn't you be getting back to doing whatever the voice in your head told you to?
translation.fr: tu ne devrais pas recommencer à faire ce que ta voix t'a dit ?

translation.en: Like I said... you wouldn't understand.
translation.fr: Comme je l'ai dit, tu ne comprendrais pas.

translation.en: Try me.
That isn't jealousy I smell...  ...is it?
translation.fr: C'est de la jalousie que je sens ?

translation.en: Oh, of course not.
Adam's like a brother to me.
translation.fr: Adam est un frère pour moi.

translation.en: I'm just worried he's gonna leave.
Some flashy magic wielder showing up isn't gonna help anything.
translation.fr: L'apparition d'une porteuse de magie ne va rien changer.

translation.en: And it's a problem we can't solve by ramming it with your helmet, I assume.
translation.fr: Et ce problème ne peut pas être résolu en le frappant avec ton casque.

translation.en: Every problem can be solved by ramming it with my helmet.
translation.fr: Mon casque peut résoudre tous les problèmes.

translation.en: We may have a different problem for you to ram.
translation.fr: Voilà un problème que tu pourrais frapper.

translation.en: So the voice in my head led me here to deliver a package.
translation.fr: La voix dans ma tête m'a amenée ici pour livrer un colis.

translation.en: To who?
You don't happen to have any champions out here, do you?
translation.fr: Vous n'avez pas de champions ici, si ?

translation.en: Being a champion
is about defending those who can't defend themselves.
translation.fr: c'est défendre ceux qui ne peuvent pas.

translation.en: That was weird. Where did that come from?
Are those poacher bots?
Give us the Witch.
Halt. Do not move.
Tiger Tribe answers to no one!
Technology!
I need to protect the village.
We'll find the girl and the sword once everyone's dead.
translation.fr: On trouvera la fille et l'épée, tuons-les tous.

translation.en: Duncan, have the robots burn the village.
translation.fr: Duncan, que les robots brûlent le village.

translation.en: No, no, no, I--
I can't do that.
Coward.
I'll run out first.
Then you get this as far from here as quickly as you can. Hide it.
translation.fr: Emmène ça le plus loin d'ici, le plus vite possible. Cache-la.

translation.en: If I survive, my voice and I will come back for it.
translation.fr: Si je survis, ma voix et moi reviendrons la chercher.

translation.en: We need water! Please--
translation.fr: Au feu ! On a besoin d'eau ! Vite !

translation.en: Fire! We need to save the village!
Ah, thank you, kind stranger.
Talking tiger!
Whoa! Flying child!
Krass, stand down. He saved me.
Hey, Evelyn.
There she is.
They don't get to attack us and run without a fight.
translation.fr: Ils ne nous attaqueront pas sans se battre.

translation.en: Come on, Cringer.
Intercept. Capture.
Contain.
Do not run.
Error.
Whoa!
Hang on. I've got you.
Don't worry. This is my favorite cliff.
I almost die here all the time.
I told you to get away from here.
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit de partir d'ici !

translation.en: Get the real sword out of here.
translation.fr: Emmène la vraie épée loin d'ici !

translation.en: I had a sword this whole time?
translation.fr: J'avais une épée tout ce temps ?

translation.en: Hand it over, thief.
You want this?
Come and get it.
By the Power of Grayskull, I have the Power?
translation.fr: Par le pouvoir du crâne ancestral, je détiens la force toute puissante ?

translation.en: I have the Power!
translation.fr: Je détiens la force toute puissante !

translation.en: - What? - No!
What? He's... a man.
The Power of Grayskull.
Will never be yours!
The Power of Grayskull...
...belongs to me!
